name: auth.teams.list
desc: Obtain a full list of workspaces your org-wide app has been approved for.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

include_icon.desc: Whether to return icon paths for each workspace. An icon path represents a URI pointing to the image signifying the workspace.

limit.desc: The maximum number of workspaces to return. Must be a positive integer no larger than 1000.

errors.invalid_limit: The value passed for `limit` was not valid.
errors.invalid_auth: The token doesn't have access to this endpoint.
